about_the_game:
Become an honorable Ronin in the Realms of Born Again. Explore an enchanting world with friends or on a solo adventure. Experience fast-paced gameplay against engaging enemies, and immersive abilities that change the pace of each duel. Each victory progresses your Ronin, offering increases in strength, equipment, and blessings.

Path to Honor

Hack-n-Slash your way through minions of the Outer Realm in redemption of your dishonorable past. Face off against kings, rulers, and deities along your path to becoming a renowned Ronin!

Thread of Fate

Weave together enchanting blessings on your Ronin's Thread, creating mechanic mashups, gameplay alterations, and equipment synergies.

Permanent Death

Death of your player ends your Ronin's Thread, but redeems the Honor gained from their life achievements. Save or spend your Honor for the benefit of new or existing Ronin!

Item Storage

Store items and equipment in your bank for safety through death. Gear up new characters or begin trading with other players to amass a grand fortune.

Cooperative Multiplayer

Enter with friends or finds them along the way! Cooperate in team-play against minion of the Realm and work together to overcome challenges thought impossible alone.

Choose your Look

Find your cosmetic style and boldly show it across the Realm! Customize your Ronin from hats to armors, weapons, and boots!
